title: President signs Finance Bill 2021-22
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 30 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Wednesday signed the Finance Bill 2021-22 which now became Finance Act.
The president has accorded his approval over the bill.
The Finance Bill 2021-22 was moved in the National Assembly on Tuesday which was passed by a majority vote.
صدر مملکت ڈاکٹر عارف علوی نے فنانس بل 22-2021 پر دستخط کر دیے
صدر مملکت کی منظوری کے بعد فنانس بل، ایکٹ بن گیا
— The President of Pakistan (@PresOfPakistan) June 30, 2021
